title: Sinche: China may be quietly taking positions in yen, euro
itunes:title: Sinche: China may be quietly taking positions in yen, euro
description:
Amherst Pierpont's Robert Sinche weighs in on non-dollar exchange rates on Bloomberg Surveillance with Tom Keene and Michael McKee.
